dict.string:
Open Redmine Project Page Workflow
This workflow enable quick access to redmine project pages. It uses Redmine API with an API key.
To be able to use the workflow, you need to : - enable Redmine API on your redmine server - generate your redmine api key from /my/account - open the workflow « script filter », to configure your Redmine server(s) settings.
version 1.0.0
